availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis Wilberding (Lousiville, Kentucky, merchant and grocer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, painter, merchant, and grocer. Native of Germany. Married to Lisetta "Lizzie" Mittendorf Wilberding in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on August 15, 1856. Father of Frank Wilberding, Lizzie Wilberding, Mary Wilberding, Annie Wilberding, and Henry Wilberding. Painter in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1858. Merchant in Louisville in 1860. Grocer in Louisville from 1861 through 1865.
